summary: A simple mod that reminds you when you're beginning to get tired. (letting you know when your Rested/Well Rested/Lover's Comfort/Vampiric Blood Rested bonus wears off in a lore-friendly way.)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#313131].[/color][center]
[color=DeepSkyBlue][size=3][b]Get Some Rest:[/b][/size][b][size=3] A simple mod to remind you when you're getting tired.[/size][/b][/color]

[color=DarkGray][i]Ever found yourself pounding away at the blacksmith anvil, or picking the pockets of unsuspecting citizens,
only to suddenly realize that you haven't slept in days, and you've lost a helpful bonus that could have allowed
you to advance further in those skills, if only you had been rested up before you attempted them?[/i][/color]



[color=GhostWhite][b]Get Some Rest[/b] will help you avoid those troubling realizations, though a lore-friendly reminder that you should
get some sleep, once any of your Rested/Well Rested/Lover's Comfort/Vampiric Blood Rested bonuses wear off.


After installing, you'll be presented with a few different default sleep reminder messages that you can choose
from. But if you don't like any of them, you can set a custom message yourself - just open the console and type:[/color]
[color=#00ff99][b]SetPQV GetSomeRest SleepMessage "Your new message here."[/b][/color]



[color=DeepSkyBlue][b]Mod feature by Nozi87[/b][/color] (begins at 4:56)
[youtube]3EK3jNQUVDM[/youtube]



[i]compatible with everything[/i]


[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/][u][b][color=Coral]Requires SKSE[/color][/b][/u][/url]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/e833AoB.jpg[/img]

[color=DarkGray]Uninstallation: simply wait until your character no longer has any rested bonuses,
and then uninstall with your usual mod manager, or remove the files from your Data folder.[/color]

- special thanks to zekethefreak for suggesting the idea -

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38633]Guardians of Kagrenzel[/url][/b][/center]
[color=#313131].[/color]
author: egocarib
